selectedVerses.text: Now therefore do not scoff, lest your bonds be made strong; for I have heard a decree of destruction from the Lord GOD of hosts against the whole land.
They scoff and speak with malice; loftily they threaten oppression.
If you are wise, you are wise for yourself; if you scoff, you alone will bear it.
At kings they scoff, and at rulers they laugh. They laugh at every fortress, for they pile up earth and take it.
Arise, O God, defend your cause; remember how the foolish scoff at you all the day!
